thnx 4 the crack man.... im smoking it now, kidding. ty 4 this, im tired of puttinmg the disk in to play the game, and yes i bought the game. thnx again. TO berenjena, try running it in compatability mode for windows me, 2000, or xp. if that dont work then it may not be compatable with ur graphicscard, or u dont meet the requirements of the game, hope this helped you

berenjena, wait lol...if u do compatability only try 2000 and xp, as 4 those r the required windows. btw are u using vista? if so then thas y it wont work and the compatability thing will do it 4 u, to run in compatability mode, right click the shortcut to the game, select properties, then a window pops up, top of it will have some options, 1 is compatability. choose that, the rest is easy man
